name: Lockes The Thief Demo
description:
In the land known as Slabland, there are three tribes: The Sages, The Sneaks and The Soldiers. You are Lockes The Thief, who is one of the most talented Sneaks. Stealth is your best friend. 

The Sages are gifted with Magick, The Soldiers are full of strength. But who are...The Sludge? A mysterious voice appears in your head to tell you not to trust The Sneaks and head for the tower. 

Fight and Sneak. Collect Luckies and use them in special ways. Do the NINJA RUN! There is a sinister plot and you must find out what it is. 

Lockes The Thief is the first commercial game created by Padlockes Technologies. It is available now on Steam, but you can play the demo to find out if you want to learn more.
